page.title: 04Use of Stone,W.Tytherley.
page.content: John Hawker founded{Norlostone}in {1967 now his family helped by two others run the firm.They make fireplaces,cut stones,polish stones and do skilled ornamental work.The stone has natural colour.It is gathered from all over Britain and from overseas e.g.marble from Italy.Italian saws are used and must be fed with water to keep the diamond tipped blades cool. When a customer requires a fireplace a type of stone is selected and a plan drawn.The sawyer cuts the stones. Boards are placed between them.The stones are numbered,then stacked into a lorry and delivered to the customer's home, there to be reassembled using cement.The name{ {Norlostone}comes from North Lodge.
